comment: I invest in your company . You tell me it is a public limited company . Then you surreptitiously make it private . I would call it despicable and fraudulent . Sicko !
amr:
# ::snt I invest in your company . You tell me it is a public limited company . Then you surreptitiously make it private . I would call it despicable and fraudulent . Sicko !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / invest-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (c / company
                  :poss (y / you)))
      :snt2 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (c2 / company
                  :ARG1-of (l / limit-01)
                  :ARG1-of (p / public-02)
                  :domain (ii3 / it))
            :ARG2 (ii4 / i))
      :snt3 (p2 / private-02
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (ii5 / it)
            :time (t2 / then)
            :manner (s / surreptitious))
      :snt4 (c3 / call-01
            :ARG0 (ii6 / i)
            :ARG1 (ii7 / it)
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (d / despicable)
                  :op2 (f / fraudulent)))
      :snt5 (s2 / sicko
            :mode expressive))
